solver.search.strategy.decision

Class Decision<V extends Variable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.strategy.decision.Decision<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Decision<V>>, ICause, Identity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecisionsSet, FastDecision, FastDecisionReal, FastDecisionSet, RootDecision

extends Object
implements Identity, ICause, Comparable<Decision<V>>
